General.Name: Shenzhen Kexin Communication Technologies Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Kexin Communication Technologies Co.,Ltd provides communication network energy solutions and services in China and internationally. It offers base station outdoor cabinets; network energy storage batteries; micro power supply products; and 5G C-RAN intelligent module solution adopts. The company also provides ODN series products, including optical fiber distribution frames, rack-type terminal boxes, SMC OCC, optical distribution boxes, FTTH network end products, fiber optic movable connectors, field mount connectors, and optical splitters, as well as application solutions and technical services. It serves operators and ICT equipment vendors. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Kexin Science and Technology Building, Shenzhen, China, 518116

3.Name: Ms. Ya Kun  Yang
